articles.title: Jumlajeevi, Dictatorial Among Long List Of Words Now Banned In Parliament
articles.description: Terms like 'jumlajeevi', 'baal buddhi', 'Covid spreader' and 'Snoopgate' and even commonly used words like 'ashamed', 'abused, 'betrayed', 'corrupt', 'drama', and 'hypocrisy' will henceforth be considered unparliamentary in Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha.
articles.content:
Parliament released a list of words to be considered unparliamentary in Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha
